response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to exceed your expectations. This exceptional item holds a significant value of $12,000 to us, reflecting its quality, innovation, and exclusivity. We believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection or business, potentially unlocking new opportunities for you. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, we kindly invite you to consider acquiring it at the same price of $12,000. We are confident that this investment will pay off in terms of functionality, prestige, and possibly even financial returns. We look forward to the opportunity to discuss how this product can meet your needs and enhance your endeavors. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Thank you for considering our offer.", "product_price": 12000}
